person.name: Shayne M. Bowen
person.description: Elder Shayne M. Bowen was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 1, 2006. He had been serving as an Area Seventy in the Idaho Area prior to his call as a General Authority. He served as president of the South America South Area between 2008 and 2010. He is currently serving as an assistant Executive Director in the Priesthood Department and in various other capacities at Church headquarters.
